title: Painted Dogs & Doom Cakes
description: What are the 79 wackiest excuses for being late to school? How do you stop a maniac dentist from terrorising children? Why is the new smartphone so ridiculously dumb? And what does it take to get every single student at Milford Junior School put on detention? Find out in the hilarious collection of short stories . One thing is guaranteed - you will NEVER pick the endings!
author: Tim Harris
